name: Hellhole Game
description:
Hellhole is an isometric physics puzzle game for Windows.

The game was designed and developed as part of a study into ludonarrative dissonance within computer games.

If you choose to download and play this game I would be very grateful if you could complete the survey linked below:

https://forms.gle/LnaVNfy6zENDKn4v5

HellholeGame_V104 published 1st April 2021

Minimum system requirements

Operating System
Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or higherCPUIntel Core i3-4170 or betterGPUNvidia GeForce GT 640 or betterHDD200 MB free spaceRAM4 GBVRAM2 GB
